name: Piazza Luisa Bar
description: With a sea view and furnished with comfortable sofas, this is the ideal place to relax while drinking a refreshing cocktail prepared by expert bartenders

name: Oasis Pool Bar
description: The pool bar where you can have a drink while sunbathing.

name: Le Dune Restaurant
description: Le Dune is a sophisticated à la carte restaurant from which you can admire the Mediterranean Sea while savouring traditional Italian dishes, revisited according to the most modern gastronomic trends.

name: Patio Villa del Parco
description: An intimate and private locale to have your breakfast, with entrance reserved for guests of Villa del Parco.

name: Tea Room
description: Located in the SPA, this bar serves a selection of teas and herbal infusions.

name: Champagnery
description: The most beautiful view of the nightlife in the square can be enjoyed from the terrace of the Champagnery. It has a unique atmosphere and offers a selection of the best Champagnes.

name: Gelateria
description: Located between the pizzeria and the beach, it is the ideal spot to enjoy an array of delectable flavours of Italian icecream.

name: Tennis Court
description: If you like tennis, you’ll love Forte Village. Our resort in Sardinia has a cool 13 tennis courts – 12 clay and 1 synthetic – all floodlit for night use. But, above all, it’s at the Forte Village Tennis Academy that you can really play and improve your game.

name: Hotel Bouganville
description: Set in sweeping lush green grounds, new Hotel Bouganville is surrounded by typical Mediterranean flowers and plants. The perfect place for a family holiday in Sardinia, this luxury hotel lies at the heart of Forte Village Resort, just steps away from the swimming pools, restaurants and the exclusive boutiques around the piazza, home to evening entertainments.

name: Aqvatica Bar
description: Located between the sports area, Forte Bay and the beach, this bar is the ideal venue for those looking to relax with a drink, fruit juices and snacks. (Open from 10.00am until 6.00pm)

name: Villa Mariam
description: Villa Mariam is the ultimate in elegance and privacy, its style and design is reminiscent of royal estates.

name: Villa Yasmine
description: Villa Yasmine is a sophisticated luxury seaview villa with private garden and heated pool built in the contemporary style.

name: Villa Sofia
description: The sophistication and scale of a great Italian country estate: nestling in a cool 900 m² private garden filled with the fragrances and colours of the Mediterranean, Villa Sofia is a masterpiece of luxury and exclusive style.

name: Villa Margherita
description: Infinite blue, one of the best beach in Sardinia, and a gorgeous Italy’s Mediterranean landscape.

name: Villa Lidia
description: Nesting in a splendid private garden with private heated pool and whirlpool tub, Villa Lidia is a homage to Italian style and the colours and contours of the Mediterranean.

name: Villa Lavinia
description: Part of The Leading Hotels of the World collection, Villa Lavinia is a sumptuous, luxurious seaview villa with heated pool and private garden at Forte Village Resort: the ultimate in sheer luxury and elegant Italian hospitality.

name: Villa Isabella
description: Set in a fragrant Mediterranean garden, the two story Villa Isabella pays homage to the Sardinian tradition with the use of its materials.

name: Villa Elina
description: Villa Elina, located on the highest and most scenic part of Forte Village in Sardinia, overlooks a stylish circular heated pool and garden.

name: Villa Chiara
description: A new benchmark for luxury and elegance. Set over two floors in a peaceful, secluded Mediterranean garden, Villa Chiara mesmerizes with its beautiful open spaces, elegant colours and sophisticated interiors, combining original contemporary design with traditional Sardinian craftsmanship.

name: Villa Beatrice
description: Just a step from the Piazza Luisa, lodged on a hillside, overlooking the sea, Villa Beatrice and its extraordinary 845sqm express the freedom and luxury of the Forte Village style.

name: Villa Azzurra
description: Villa Azzurra is a tribute to luxury and fulfils the desire to immerse oneself in the nature of Sardinia, its energy and fresh Mediterranean fragrances.

name: Villa Aurora
description: Villa Aurora marks the dawn of a new era in luxury. In an exclusive panoramic position in the highest part of Forte Village Resort, this luxurious seaview villa with heated pool and private garden is a kingdom of light, elegance and relaxation for an unforgettable holiday in Sardinia.

name: Villa Ambra
description: It glistens in the light of the Mediterranean, like the precious resin of its name. Villa Ambra is a marvellous villa suite built on the highest and most panoramic part of the resort.

name: Children's Wonderland
description: In our resort for kids and families in Sardinia, there is an enchanted garden for children, just a stone’s throw from the sea (and mom and dad) called Wonderland. As never before the luxury family resort, Forte Village, will shine in the sky for every little guest.

name: Barbie Activity Centre
description: Our little guests will have the opportunity to enjoy unforgettable Barbie™ experiences: from the ultimate “Barbie™ Vip Package” including an exclusive Barbie themed room!

name: Mario's Village
description: Mario’s Village is the children play area at the Children’s Wonderland and it is designed for children of all ages, starting from 3 years old.

name: Nursery
description: For littlest ones, Forte Village has created a special place, the Nursery.

name: Shops
description: Forte Village is also synonymous of high fashion. During your vacation at the best resort in Sardinia, you will also be able to shop at our wide range of boutiques offering the foremost Italian and international designer labels.

name: Hotel Il Borgo
description: Set in lush green surroundings in the highest part of Forte Village Resort, the deluxe bungalows at Hotel Il Borgo enjoy spectacular views. Surrounded by the light and nature of Sardinia, the bungalows are close to Children’s Wonderland, the Oasis swimming pool and the Baia delle Palme pool with its brilliant water slides.

name: Verde Hall
description:
The Sala Verde in the enchanting Oasis Pool area is being upgraded to provide additional meeting and banqueting facilities to add to the choice of all-weather MICE facilities and provide
an enchanting social environment for the perfect cocktail party and gala dinner.s.

name: Brasiliano Restaurant
description: In this restaurant, with its fresh and relaxed atmosphere you can enjoy delicious meats spit roasted over a charcoal grill.

name: Gourmet Cooking Academy
description: Being a good cook means tempting and captivating your diners, and having fun. So why not attend a cooking class taught by Forte Village’s fantastic chefs? Our superb Cooking Academy will teach you the basics of the very best traditional Italian and international cuisine, how to perfect one of its pièces de résistance, or how to create a whole menu.

name: Children's Restaurant
description: First and foremost Forte Village is a family resort that provides top quality services specially designed for children.

name: Da Rocco Iannone
description: With a magnificent view over the Oasis pool, this restaurant is run by Chef Rocco Iannone. An enchanting locale, where you can rediscover the best traditional Italian cuisine.

name: Sport Academy Center
description: Our Sports Academy offers the professional training, enthusiasm and experience of great international champions

name: Bianca Hall
description: The Bianca Hall is a meeting room that can hold from 70 to 450 people and is located in the heart of the Forte Village Resort, next to the three Oasis swimming pools and the central Maria Luigia square.

name: Oasis Pool
description: Located at the centre of our Resort, the Oasis Pool is just the start of your Sardinian summer

name: Bike World
description: Forte Village has partnered with PPRFactory and the Italian bicycle brand 3T Bikes, with a concept store offering 3T’s range of performance bikes available for guests to use on tailor-made excursions during their stay

name: Sardo Restaurant
description: Sardinia boasts one of the most varied and flavourful gastronomic cultures of Italy, a real melting pot of varied histories and cultures. At Ristorante Sardo you can taste local pasta dishes, meats, vegetables and local cheeses, desserts and wines from the region.

name: Mordi Healthy Restaurant and Bar
description: Nourish your body and indulge in the delicious flavors of our new Healthy Restaurant and Bar.

name: Forte Grill
description: Forte Grill offers an exceptional selection of high quality meat from Italy, Ireland and Australia, as well as a choice of desserts and icecreams.

name: Hell's Kitchen
description: If we may say so, it is one hell of a restaurant: that’s the remarkable Hell’s Kitchen, another fantastic world first to add to Forte Village’s list of records.

name: Piazza Luisa
description: Piazza Luisa, at the heart of the Forte Village, is a social hub offering shows, entertainment and an exclusive shopping experience.

name: Piazzetta
description: Forte Village is also synonymous of high fashion. During your vacation you will also be able to shop at our wide range of boutiques offering the foremost Italian and international designer labels.

name: Basket Court
description:
Your passion for basketball does not allow for breaks? Do you want to challenge your friends in exciting matches with hoops and rebounds?
Forte Village is the perfect place for you: a calendar full of activities and lots of basketball games organized amongst guests to exercise all summer long.

name: Forte's Bakery
description: Dulcis in fundo…treat yourself to a break with something sweet from our Pasticceria

name: Wine Bar
description: At the entry to the Piazza you will find this splendid wine bar, where you can enjoy a glass of excellent Italian and foreign wine.

name: Hotel Le Dune
description: Set in a privileged location just steps from the beach cabanas by the sea, 5-star Hotel Le Dune offers a choice of magnificent Deluxe Bungalows each immersed in its own secluded garden with a private patio, and exclusive Suites each with a beautiful, tranquil private garden, some with sea views. The bathroom has a bathtub and shower.

name: Fish Market
description: A magnificent seafood restaurant that looks out to sea, the perfect place to enjoy a selection of fresh fish and crustacean, all cooked on the grill.

name: Fit Zone
description: If you prefer to train in group, you can try one of the courses especially designed for our guests at the our Fitzone in the Sport Area.

name: Celebrity Chef Nights
description: A star-studdend culinary experience awaits you! Stay tuned to find the calendar of this year!

name: Sport Area
description: Discover the pleasure of working out in the open air, surrounded by the beautiful nature of Sardinia that will amaze you with its views, fragrances and landscapes.

name: Football Court
description: There is no such thing as summer without a soccer game! That’s why Forte Village is the perfect resort for your holidays: four 5 a side soccer fields in artificial turf that can be turned into two fields of 7vs7 or 8vs8 and an 11 a side field with large stands.

name: Terrazza San Domenico
description: Chef Massimiliano Mascia, of San Domenico di Imola, brings the excellence of Romagna cuisine to Forte Village.

name: Pizzeria
description: Our pizzeria offers all the joy and casualness of a great pizza with traditional and natural ingredients. To complete the menù, there are other typical Italian dishes such as the Caprese di Bufala, made with buffalo milk cheese, freshly sliced cold meats and a wide selection of fresh salads.

name: Bellavista Restaurant
description: A splendid buffet restaurant directly overlooking the sea, offering a wide variety of traditional Italian and Sardinian food. Here you can taste local produce from zero kilometres away.

name: Cala del Forte Suites
description: The four Cala del Forte suites offer unparalleled views over the Mediterranean. Their ample interiors and stylish furnishings blend seamlessly with the breath-taking vistas.

name: Boat House Watersports
description: Nothing’s more fun than messing about in a boat! Come to the Boat House on the beach at Forte Village and you’ll find everything you could need to have fun on the water – catamarans, canoes, pedalos, windsurf boards and dinghies.

name: Tiki Bar
description: The Tiki Beach with its tropical style, will accompany your evenings with fantastic cocktails in front of a breathtaking landscape.

name: Castello Pool
description: A heated infinity pool, just a breath away from the sea

name: Heinz Beck Restaurant
description: Heinz Beck brings his Michelin star flavour to Forte Village. The culinary pioneer and three Michelin starred Chef, will be at Forte Village this summer to delight our guests palettes!

name: Beachcomber by Heinz Beck
description: A superb seafood restaurant overlooking the sea. Freshly grilled fish served with a selection of salad, pasta, fresh fruit and homemade icecream.

name: Boat House Suites
description: The four Boat House suites are just moments away from the most beautiful beach in all Sardinia. The completely secluded setting provides the ultimate freedom, with all the Resort’s most exclusive services always to hand.

name: Beachcomber Suites
description: The four sophisticated Beachcomber suites benefit from wonderful terraces and gorgeous sunbathing areas with views over the sea. The bedrooms with two double beds and bathrooms with tub and shower are set slightly higher than the living area.

name: Cavalieri Restaurant
description: The Cavalieri is an elegant 5 star restaurant surrounded by greenery, where every dinner is accompanied by pleasant piano music.

name: Bandiere Bar
description: Located inside the Castello is the most elegant and traditional of the Forte Village bars. The ideal venue for listening to live music while enjoying a whiskey.

name: Il Castello Suites
description: Masterpieces of elegance, luxury and seclusion, the suites on the 4th and 5th Executive floors of Hotel Il Castello are served by a private lift. They offer spectacular, sweeping views over the sea and gardens at Forte Village Resort, stretching as far as the mountains.

name: Hotel Il Castello
description: Completely refurbished in 2016, 5-star Hotel Il Castello is an oasis of luxury, elegance and exclusive service just steps from one of the most stunning beaches in Sardinia.

name: Hotel Le Palme
description: Just moments away from the magnificent Oasis pool and buzzing Piazza Luisa, Hotel Le Palme is an oasis of calm conveniently located at the heart of the resort.

name: Hotel Castello Garden Bungalows
description: Perfect for families, the five-star Castello Garden Bungalows extends the range of comfortable family accommodation offered by the Hotel Castello for guests who prefer independent accommodation with personal service.

name: Conference Center
description: The Forte Village conference centre comprises 18 conference rooms – the largest of which can hold up to 900 people – and 4 large meeting rooms equipped with the most modern high-tech equipment.

name: Sala dei Cristalli
description: Sala Dei Cristalli, a new glass walled meeting space able to host up to 450 people. This new facility is located adjacent to the existing conference center and Hotel Castello.​

name: Pineta Restaurant
description: A large buffet surrounded by pine grove, offering a vast array of dishes each day. The menù is further enriched during theme nights with traditional dishes.

name: Hotel Pineta
description: Surrounded by the freshness of a centuries-old pine grove, Hotel Pineta is a haven of luxury, tranquillity and Mediterranean beauty. This newly refurbished, elegant 5-star hotel pays homage to Mediterranean architecture with its horseshoe shape and two floors overlooking an airy courtyard.

name: Belvedere Restaurant
description: The gourmet restaurant, the Belvedere, is located on a fabulous terrace overlooking the park.

name: Villa del Parco Hotel
description: Part of the Leading Hotels of the World collection, Villa del Parco is a magnificent, wonderfully intimate 5-star hotel set in the gardens of Forte Village Resort, just moments away from the enchanting Acquaforte Spa and its famous treatments.

name: Private Spa
description: The ultimate in privacy, a new luxurious ‘Private SPA’, located within the Acquaforte Spa in Sardinia, can now be reserved for exclusive use by a family and friends.

name: Aquaforte Thalasso & Spa
description: In a natural setting equipped with all amenities, our resort is particularly recommended to those who cannot do without taking care of themselves even on holiday.

name: Aquapark
description:
The place where children of all ages can play safely, slide in the water slides and swim in the adjacent pools.
A pirate ship, water cannons, mini slides and a soft anti-slip floor in the water games area, are available to younger children.

name: Circus
description: Immerse yourself in a world of thrilling games, abundant laughter, vibrant lights, kaleidoscope of colors, and an enchanting atmosphere nestled in the heart of the picturesque Sardinia.

name: Rugby Court
description: Want to reach the touchline and score a try for your team? Want to learn all the secrets of this fantastic game? How about meeting the rugby greats and playing with them? Then join our unbeatable Rugby Academy with Legends, with the biggest names from English and Irish rugby.

name: Forte Arena
description: The open-air theatre of Forte Village Resort: Forte Arena is the perfect location for great shows, concerts of Italian and international artists, and corporate events like product presentations, conferences, team building events and gala dinners.

name: Bowling
description: Choose your lane, pick your favourite song on the jukebox, take your bowling bowl and knock down those pins. We look forward to seeing you in our bowling alley in July and August in the morning and from five in the afternoon to two at night, and in May, June and September in the afternoon and evening.

name: GoKart Track
description: Take your place on the grid, put your foot down on the accelerator and you’re off, racing along the half-kilometre track. Watch out for the bends, just one more lap and you could be celebrating first place on the podium with some champagne.

name: Discoteque
description: Great sounds, great rhythms, great energy! Get ready to party on our dance floor where non-stop music played by our DJs and live bands will keep you going till the early hours.

name: Leisureland
description: A teen paradise at Forte Village, a secret, fun place, open only to people who like their adventure exciting and their music loud.
